text: The peanut butter and jelly sandwich or PB&J; is a sandwich, popular in North America. It has a layer of peanut butter and either jelly or jam usually on 2 slices of bread. Peanut Butter and Jelly sandwiches have around 375 calories. == Popularity == Peanut Butter and Jelly sandwiches are popular in schools and popular amongst children On April 2, 2016, it is revealed most people may eat almost 3,000 peanut butter and jelly sandwiches in their lifetime. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Sandwiches
title: Peanut butter and jelly sandwich
